titles.title: Planning Actively for Cancer Treatment (PACT) Act of 2013
To amend title XVIII of the Social Security Act to provide for coverage of cancer care planning and coordination under the Medicare program.

action.text: Referred to the Committee on Energy and Commerce, and in addition to the Committee on Ways and Means, for a period to be subsequently determined by the Speaker, in each case for consideration of such provisions as fall within the jurisdiction of the committee concerned.

bill.summary: 6/25/2013--Introduced. Planning Actively for Cancer Treatment (PACT) Act of 2013 - Amends title XVIII (Medicare) of the Social Security Act to provide for coverage of cancer care planning and coordination services.
